content.rendered:
Directed by Bharat Kamma

Written by Jay Krishna. Gautam Siddharth

Cast Vijay Deverakonda (Chaitanya ‘Bobby’ Makineni). Rashmika Mandanna (Aparna ‘Lilly’ Devi). Raj Arjun (Ramesh Rao). Shruti Ramachandran (Jaya (as Sruthi Ramachandran)). Suhas (Martin). Tulasi (Jaya’s Mother). Anand (Bobby’s Father). Sanjay Swaroop (Lilly’s Father). Kalyani Natarajan (Bobby’s Mother). S.S. Kanchi. Charu Haasan (Bobby’s Grandfather (as Charuhasan)). Srikanth Iyengar (Police Officer). Ashrita Vemuganti (Lilly’s Mother (as Ashritha)). Subbalakshmi. Santhosh Adduri ((as Santosh Adduri)). Vadlamani Srinivas.Dattu.Karthik. Vikas (Raghu). Tharun. Kiwish. Dwaraka. Udhay Pulime. Vinay. Raj Swaroop. Vaishnavi. Rajesh. Chakri. Balveer Singh. Jeevan. Surya. Ramakrishna Kodamanchili. Sudhakar. Ravi Anand Chinnabilli. Ramakrishna Raju. Bhavani. Lawrance. Madhavi Deverakonda. Asuthosh Rampay ((as Ashtosh Rampay)). Shashank. Dayanand Reddy (BCCI Enquiry Team Head (as Dayanand)). Gururaj. Prathyusha. Dheeksha. Gouthami. Niteesh. Sinjith. Akshay. Sonia. Charan ((as Charan & Friend – KKD)). Sharath.Praneeth. Pkaushikji (Prem). Pradeep Rajput (Surya). Hitesh rathod (Suryaa (voice) (as Hitesh Rathod Viratian)). Sathviksriram (Surya). Mohammad Shawon (Musical artist). S.N. Ahmed (Vice Principal (uncredited)). Phanindra Gollapalli (BCCI Chief Enquiry Officer (uncredited)). Md Azimul Islam Sheblu (Rocky (uncredited)). Divya Sripada (Anitha (uncredited))

Languages Telugu

Producers Mohan Cherukuri. Chiranjeevi Pedamallu. Yash Rangineni. Y. Ravi Shankar. Naveen Yerneni

Production Mythri Movie Maker. Big Ben Cinema. Goldmines Telefilm
